name: W O B B L E
name_original: W O B B L E
description:
W O B B L E is a fast-paced puzzle platformer that involves using physics and moving blocks to solve puzzles. It gets really hard, so look out! Thank you for playing!

WASD/arrows + mouse. R to restart

Game by Braeden Trefethen and Angus Goucher using Godot, Aseprite, and FL Studio.

NOTE: FPS issues on high-refresh (>60 FPS) screens, (PATCHED) version recommended :)
